item.description:
Showtime is 7pm. I'll be at the theatre, upstairs, top of the escalators, by the windows at 6pm, and we'll head in for seats around 6:30 as is our convention to get good seats together and ridicule the others.

If you miss us before the show, we'll hang around in the hallway outside the show for potty breaks and further ridiculing before heading out for some food...and ridiculing.

If you plan to join us for inspired conversation and good food, please be courteous to our party and the restaurant staff and BRING CASH. It makes everything smoother and faster for everyone.

Now, about the film...

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Nick (Jesse Eisenberg, love child of Andy Samberg and Michael Cera) is a pizza deliverer who lives a fairly ordinary, boring life -- until he crosses paths with two aspiring criminal masterminds (Danny McBride, Nick Swardson), who kidnap him, strap a bomb to his chest and force him to rob a bank for them. Nick doesn't get much time to pull off the difficult task, so he enlists the aid of Chet (Aziz Ansari, a friend to Canadians), his estranged pal. As time ticks away, Nick and Chet face many obstacles, not the least of which is their volatile relationship.

As Facebooker Caleb Jeffrey Broadnax pointed out, "dis is going to b funny as sh*t." Well said, Sir, well said.

Cast: Jesse Eisenberg, Danny McBride, Aziz Ansari, Nick Swardson, Michael Peña

Director: Ruben Fleischer
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be parked upstairs, atop the escalators, by the windows. Look for the goofy, oafish lout with the Meetup sign.
